DOC.brief_summary: This trial , base split mouth double-blind design , evaluate effect surface sealant clinical performance composite resin class I restoration . According eligibility criterion , 10 pair upper low molar premolar restore Esthet X composite resin . For pair , one surface seal Lasting Touch surface sealant . A clinical evaluation perform two experienced operator use modify USPHS ( United States Public Health service ) 5 year treatment . Data analyze use McNemar test ( p < 0.05 ) .
DOC.brief_title: A 5-year Clinical Trial Assessing Effects Surface Sealant Composite Resin Class I Restorations
DOC.detailed_description: The protocol approve Human Ethics Committee ( protocol number 133/2010 , CAAE 0124.0.224.000.-10 ) , patient sign inform consent form complete registration form prior treatment . The eligibility criterion participation study include good oral hygiene , class I caries lesion unsatisfactory restoration least two posterior teeth ( molar premolar ) , buccolingual extension , sign consent form . The exclusion criterion include patient proximal caries lesion , presence periodontal disease , symptomatic restore nonrestored teeth indicate irreversible pulpal pathology , abnormal occlusion absence antagonist teeth , exposure pulpal tissue , extend large cavity . This study include 10 patient ( age 18 45 year ) total 14 pairs class I restoration ( molar premolars ) . These pair randomly divide two study group , result split-mouth design . A hybrid resin composite , Esthet X ( Dentsply , Caulk , USA ) etch-and-rinse two-step adhesive , AdperTM Single Bond ( 3M , ESPE ) use composite restoration . For teeth surface sealant , cover Lasting Touch ( Dentsply , Caulk , USA ) . All cavity preparation restoration perform experienced operator , use rubber dam isolation . Cavity design prepared use # 245 carbide bur ( KG Sorensen , Cotia , SP , Brazil ) , change every five preparation . All enamel border cavity margin verify . The restorative procedure perform use rubber dam isolation . In deep cavity , dentin cover calcium hydroxide ( Dycal ; Dentsply Ind . e Com . Ltda. , Petrópolis , RJ , Brazil ) resin-modified glass-ionomer cement ( Vitrebond , 3M ESPE , St. Paul , MN , USA ) . In deep cavity dentin cover solely resin-modified glass-ionomer cement . The enamel dentin etch 37 % phosphoric acid ( Scotchbond Etchant ; 3M/ESPE , St. Paul , MN , USA ) 30 15 , respectively . Then rinse water spray 30 gently thoroughly dried absorbent paper 10 s. Two coat one-bottle adhesive ( Adper TM Single Bond 2 , 3M/ESPE , St. Paul , MN , USA ) apply homogeneously surface disposable micro-brush . The cavity gently brush faint air jet , allow solvent evaporation , light-cured 10 LED light ( Smart Lite OS , Dentsply Indústria e Comércio Ltda. , Rio de Janeiro/RJ - Brasil ) , 1270 mW/cm2 power density . The class I teeth cavity restore 2 mm increment composite resin , use steel instrument ( XTS Goldstein Flexi-Thin Mini # 3 , Hu-Friedy , Rio de Janeiro , RJ ) , light-cured 20 , light source power density . The finish polishing procedure perform seven day , use fine diamond multilaminated bur , follow one step polish system Pogo ( Dentsply , Caulk , USA ) . These procedure perform use slow-speed hand piece water spray . The disk , bur , point discard use . For teeth assign control group ( NSS ) , treat finish polishing procedure . Teeth include SS group cover use nanotechnology liquid polish system ( Lasting Touch , Dentsply Caulk , Milford , DE , USA ) apply per manufacturer 's direction finish polishing.. For application , composite surface 1 mm external limit etch 37 % acid phosphoric acid gel 30 thoroughly rinse . The excess water remove mild oil free air stream , per manufacturer 's instruction . Utilizing disposable micro brush , uniform layer low-viscosity agent apply etched area , gently air brush 15 light-cured light source . The quality restoration rat accord U.S. Public Health System/Ryge criterion . Two independent experience examiner assessed restoration . Restorations bee calibrate accord Cohen 's Kappa . Where disagreement occur evaluation , consensus obtain among examiner . It double-blind evaluation , neither examiner patient know treatment evaluation . Examinations perform directly use mirror probe . The evaluation obtain baseline ( 1 2 week insertion ) 5 year treatment . The parameter include marginal discoloration , anatomic form , secondary caries marginal integrity . Data statistically analyze use McNemar 's test ( p < 0.05 ) .
DOC.criteria: Good oral hygiene ; Having class I caries lesion unsatisfactory restoration least two posterior teeth ( molar premolar ) ; Be agreement sign consent form . Patients proximal caries lesion ; Presence periodontal disease ; Presence symptomatic restore non restore teeth indicate irreversible pulpal pathology ; Presence abnormal occlusion absence antagonist teeth ; Presence exposure pulpal tissue ; Presence extend large cavity .
